Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jhonny L.
Reviews.Content: This my second Sony Digital Camera. The first was a 14.1 MP and I can say less than $80 for this 20.1 MP, you can't find it anywhere else! It functions very well. It can take pictures even in the darkest place. I would recommend it to anyone who needs a good camera for a good price!

Reviews.Title: Great for vacation snapshots
Reviews.Author: M. Lee
Reviews.Content: I'm a very occasional photographer, so this camera meets my needs very well.  I find it easy to operate.  This camera has a rechargeable LI-ON battery, and this is an improvement over my older camera that uses AA batteries.  I like the feature that corrects for camera shake, as I had sometimes had blurry photos with my older camera and this is much improved with the Sony.  Obviously, if you're a serious photographer, this is not the camera for you, but for me, it's great.  I like to buy a less expensive camera in case I drop it in a lake or off a bridge by accident, and this seems fine for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Tracy L. Judy
Reviews.Content: This camera exceeded all of my expectations. It is small, lightweight and very easy to handle with one hand.The pictures are sharp, extremely clear. It has a built in macro lens for shooting small objects/flowers/insects.Excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome pictures!
Reviews.Author: mabs
Reviews.Content: I love how the pictures look :D and its so thing and light to carry around :) Im happy with my purchased

Reviews.Title: Not What I Expected
Reviews.Author: pychester
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get a 20 mp camera, thinking it would be even better than my Sony 8 mp 150, but it does not even come close in quality pictures or ease of use.  Perhaps I need some time to study it and experiment, but I am disappointed with the picture quality.  It looks awesome on the viewer but after the button is pushed the picture is fuzzy somewhat.  Not clear and crisp. The features are more trouble to access on the menu,  but may get easier with time and use.  The main complaint I have is the picture quality. It just doesn't measure up.  I found another Sony 8 mp 150, like new and purchased it from a private seller. I may sell this 800, we'll see.

Reviews.Title: 20.1 MP where?
Reviews.Author: fred brady
Reviews.Content: I knew for this cheap price i would not get a good quality camera anywhere. So i decided to give it a try and buy this one, since 20.1 MP sounds fantastic! The problem is.. I do not see that many pixels on the photos, it is so frustrating. I really expected this camera to make better pictures. Remember to buy a memory card too!I could not find the special effects for the colors such as grey etc.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Betty L. Mann
Reviews.Content: This is for my daughters birthday. Hope the zoom is good. Sony is a good name so Feel fairly safe that it will fill the bill.

Reviews.Title: This is a very nice camera.
Reviews.Author: ga hillbilly
Reviews.Content: I chose it because it is a 20 mp digital. It can easily handle a 16 GB memory card, and it also automatically connects to the computer for uploading pictures. It was also very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Good items.
Reviews.Author: Saren Becerra
Reviews.Content: is a good article, I arrive on time and in perfect condition, not to be a professional camera takes very good pictures, just make a suggestion, I include an external memory to the article.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: emanon
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement from the P O S that was a Nikon. Never buy a point and click Nikon again. Service, and quality sucked!Do you hear me Sony! Better make me happy.

Reviews.Title: All is good with this camera thus far. Unless the required repair conspiracy happens again with this type of camera.
Reviews.Author: Eliot
Reviews.Content: The Quality is Good ...but remember you need the right amount of light to get the Best quality out of the Pictures and Video! Don't forget that, for those that complain about the quality from Any camera, it's a no-brainer. The various levels of megapixel quality is great.With my last Sony Touchscreen 8mp Camera, there is a little tiny bios battery hidden in the camera. It goes out in a couple or few years and then you send it in to get it "repaired" not knowing what happened. I never sent it it to get it "repaired" for a whole 200 dollars. I discovered this hidden secret battery on my own and haven't been able to stick the new battery on quite yet. I hope that Sony didn't do that to this camera too.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: zelmar arteta
Reviews.Content: sony great model camera, delivered ok, little pack, good pricepros: allcons: noi recomend this camera to any

Reviews.Title: Sony camera
Reviews.Author: clint
Reviews.Content: for the money this is a deal.  It is very easy to use as well.  I didn't realize it came with it's own battery and a charger for it.  I've only been playing with it for a few minutes now and I already like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Livy
Reviews.Content: In my opinion some options, like scenes or light setup, should be acessed with the external bottom, without the obligation to go to Menu. It would be quicker to set my preference... The older models were like this.

ProductInfo.Features:
MP Super HAD CCD sensor for beautifully detailed images
Sony Lens w/ 5x Optical Zoom
Reduced blur with SteadyShot Image stabilization
Capture your videos in 720p HD Movie mode
Simplify camera menu with Easy Mode
Take stunning images in Sweep Panorama mode-up to 360
Smile Shutter technology automatically captures smiles
Creative shooting with Picture Effects
Conveniently charge your battery via USB3
In camera guide helps navigate features
ProductInfo.Name: Sony W800/B 20 MP Digital Camera (Black)
